TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type DesignerRegionCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示控件设计器中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和任何派生类使用 类在设计宿主（如）中包含和枚举控件的设计器区域 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 。The class, and any derived class, uses the class to contain and enumerate the designer regions for the control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如， 方法可用于定义区域并将其添加到集合中。For example, the method can be used to define and add regions to the collection. 使用 属性可访问包含设计器区域集合的控件设计器对象。Use the property to access the control designer object that contains the designer region collection. 使用 方法和属性来检查和维护 集合中的对象。Use the methods and properties to examine and maintain the objects that are in the collection. 添加对象时，集合会动态增加。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 此集合中的索引从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用 属性可确定集合中有多少设计器区域。Use the property to determine how many designer regions are in the collection. 使用 成员提供以下功能：Use the members to provide the following functionality: - 向 集合中添加单个设计器区域的方法。The method to add a single designer region to the collection. - 用于在集合中的特定索引处添加设计器区域的方法。The method to add a designer region at a particular index within the collection. - 用于移除设计器区域的方法。The method to remove a designer region. - 用于移除特定索引处的设计器区域的方法。The method to remove the designer region at a particular index. - 用于确定特定设计器区域是否已存在于集合中的方法。The method to determine whether a particular designer region is already in the collection. - 用于检索集合中设计器区域的索引的方法。The method to retrieve the index of a designer region within the collection. - 用于获取或设置特定索引处的设计器区域的索引器，使用数组表示法。The indexer to get or set the designer region at a particular index, using array notation. - 要从集合中移除所有设计器区域的方法。The method to remove all designer regions from the collection.

related.span: 扩展设计时支持

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 为指定的控件设计器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个空集合，并将 属性设置为指定的控件设计器对象。The constructor creates an empty collection and sets the property to the specified control designer object. 可视化设计器（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）使用 构造函数来初始化特定控件设计器的设计器区域集合。The visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the constructor to initialize a designer region collection for a specific control designer. 您可以通过使用或方法向集合中添加 元素 。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过对对象使用方法来确定相等性 。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间与属性成正比 。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板区域集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中 对象的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中 对象的数目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性通常用于在循环访问集合中的对象时确定上限索引。The property is commonly used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 由于集合索引是从零开始的，因此第一个元素位于索引处， `0` 最后一个元素位于索引处 `Count-1` 。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举集合不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会导致枚举过程中出现异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 在 整个枚举过程中，通过使用方法锁定集合以保证线程安全。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.

related.span: 扩展设计时支持

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 索引器检索集合中指定索引处的区域，或设置集合中指定索引处的区域。Use the indexer to retrieve the region at the specified index within the collection or to set the region at the specified index within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法来索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以 `i` 使用 `DesignerRegions(i)` Microsoft 标志或 c # 的表示法在 index 处为元素编制索引 `DesignerRegions[i]` 。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `DesignerRegions(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `DesignerRegions[i]` for C#. 如果引用了 region 对象并需要集合中对象的索引，请使用 方法。When you have a reference to the region object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

summary.span: 获取具有设计器区域集合的控件设计器。

span.span: Gets the control designer that owns the designer region collection.

value.span: 控件，表示具有 的控件设计器。

span.span: A that represents the control designer that owns the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种便捷的方式来访问设计器区域集合的控件设计器对象。The property provides a convenient means to access the control designer object for a designer region collection. 例如，你可以使用 属性来确定拥有集合的控件设计器的类型，并访问控件设计器的属性和方法。For example, you can use the property to determine the type of control designer that owns the collection and to access the properties and methods of the control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion region) cil managed

param.name: region
param.span: 要从该集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从集合中移除指定区域的第一个匹配项。The method removes the first occurrence of the specified region from the collection. 如果 对象不包含指定的 `region` ，则集合保持不变。If the object does not contain the specified `region`, the collection remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过对对象使用方法来确定相等性 。The method determines equality by using the method on the object. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间与属性成正比 。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板区域集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的区域，请使用 方法。To remove a region at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中删除所有区域，请使用 方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引会发生更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

related.span: 扩展设计时支持

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举集合不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会导致枚举过程中出现异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 在 整个枚举过程中，通过使用方法锁定集合以保证线程安全。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 有关锁定线程安全访问的集合的详细信息，请参阅 。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .
